languages.text: Неподвижная громада корабля-тюрьмы продолжает дрейф. Сложно придумать наказание страшнее.
The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.
languages.original_text: Неподвижная громада корабля-тюрьмы продолжает дрейф. Сложно придумать наказание страшнее.

traits.locale_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship continues its drift. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.
The motionless hulk of the prison ship continues its drift. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.
The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.
The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.
The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.
The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

languages.text: Das reglose Gefängnisschiff treibt weiter. Eine grauenhaftere Strafe kann man sich kaum vorstellen.
languages.original_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

traits.locale_text: Das reglose Gefängnisschiff treibt weiter. Eine grauenhaftere Strafe kann man sich kaum vorstellen.

languages.text: La carcasse du vaisseau-prison continue sa dérive. Il est difficile d'imaginer un châtiment plus terrible.
languages.original_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

traits.locale_text: La carcasse du vaisseau-prison continue sa dérive. Il est difficile d'imaginer un châtiment plus terrible.

languages.text: その監獄船の動かぬ残骸は、なおも漂い続けている。これ以上に恐ろしい罰は、想像すらできないだろう。
languages.original_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

traits.locale_text: その監獄船の動かぬ残骸は、なおも漂い続けている。これ以上に恐ろしい罰は、想像すらできないだろう。

languages.text: Los restos inmóviles de la nave siguen a la deriva. Es difícil imaginar un castigo más aterrador.
languages.original_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

traits.locale_text: Los restos inmóviles de la nave siguen a la deriva. Es difícil imaginar un castigo más aterrador.

languages.text: 彻底失去动力的监狱船继续在太空中漂流，恐怕没有比这更可怕的惩罚了。
languages.original_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

traits.locale_text: 彻底失去动力的监狱船继续在太空中漂流，恐怕没有比这更可怕的惩罚了。

languages.text: Hapishane gemisi uçsuzda sürükleniyor. Bundan daha korkunç bir ceza düşünmekte zorlanıyorsun.
languages.original_text: The motionless hulk of the prison ship drifts on. One could hardly imagine a more terrifying punishment.

traits.locale_text: Hapishane gemisi uçsuzda sürükleniyor. Bundan daha korkunç bir ceza düşünmekte zorlanıyorsun.
